title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:1. [Please provide steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the item to be selected.
EB: Expect to be able to select any item in the library outline view on the first attempt without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
